original_text: And Esau was forty years old when he took to wife Judith the daughter of Beeri the Hittite, and Bashemath the daughter of Elon the Hittite:
korean_text: 에서가 사십 세에 헷 족속 브에리의 딸 유딧과 헷 족속 엘론의 딸 바스맛을 아내로 맞이하였더니

sentences.original_text: And Esau was forty years old
when he took to wife Judith
the daughter of Beeri the Hittite
the daughter of Elon the Hittite:
